thread.title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series
thread.title_full: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - "Vampire Academy" author Richelle Mead is giving life to a new series.
Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday that Mead's "The Glittering Court" will launch April 12. The publisher is calling the fantasy series "a mix of Elizabethan and frontier worlds," featuring three girls on a "search of empowerment and love."
Mead's previous series also include "Bloodlines," ''Georgina Kincaid" and "Dark Swan."
